comments.body: I'm surprised that these functions don't already exist in test/e2e (non-node). Is there any common code you can reuse between the two suites? If it's a big refactoring it doesn't need to be in this PR.

I didn't find anything in a quick search of e2e/util.go or doing a code search for kube-apiserver.  Do the e2e tests use the bash cluster scripts to setup the cluster so maybe these aren't required by the e2e tests?  Added a TODO to either dedup or merge these into e2e/util.
